meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Redling Kiran Kedlaya Kendra Anspaugh Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6257.

td.p: Mary Redling, an operations manager from Huntington, West Virginia
Kiran Kedlaya, a math professor originally from Boston, Massachusetts
Kendra Anspaugh, a community college instructor from New Orleans, Louisiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $61,300)

tr.td: EVENING CONSTITUTIONAL
STADIUM FOOD
LATIN BODY PARTS
-OLOGIES
THE CONSTRUCTION CREW
THE WRECKING CREW
